amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3277 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 370.

Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S12850-12852; text: CR S12850) To prohibit funds from being used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3277 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 370.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Vitter.
